alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:20AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Sebastian, east central Haskell, southeastern Sequoyah and northern Le Flore Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 420 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Muldrow to 5 miles south of Gans to Keota. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Hackett... Bonanza... Keota... Bokoshe... Midland... Gans... Cameron... Moffett... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 314 and 326. Interstate 540 between mile markers 8 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
